00036 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #define GETU16( var, buf) {                             \
00038                 (var) = (*(buf) << 8) & 0xFF00;         \
00039                 (var) |= (*((buf)+1) & 0xFF);           \
00040         }
00041 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 #define PUTU16( buf, var) {                             \
00050                 (*(buf)) = ((var) >> 8);                \
00051                 *((buf)+1) = ((var) & 0xFF);            \
00052         }
